amendment.description: An amendment numbered 84 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds to carry out the actions described in the fact sheet released by the White House related to "junk fees" in retirement investment advice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
